data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during CONWAY cruise from Montevideo to Valparaiso started at 1820-11-12

Ship: Conway (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Montevideo - Valpariso, 1st Observer: Basil Hall (Captain), 2nd Observer: Alexander Milne (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 26G 444BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
